wikitext.*:
<includeonly><script>
RLQ.push(function(){
var tag='.wikitable-'+'<!--{$name|escape:'javascript'}-->'.replace(/[^0-9a-z-]/gi,'');
var border='<!--{$border|escape:'javascript'}-->'.replace(/[^0-9a-f]/gi,'');
var header='<!--{$header|escape:'javascript'}-->'.replace(/[^0-9a-f]/gi,'');
var body='<!--{$body|escape:'javascript'}-->'.replace(/[^0-9a-f]/gi,'');
mw.loader.addStyleTag(tag+'{background:#'+border+'}'+tag+' th{background:#'+header+'}'+tag+' td{background:#'+body+'}');
});
</script></includeonly><noinclude>
Only for {{tl|ColoredTable}}
</noinclude>
